problem.p: What was your background in physics prior to this class? You may check more than one option if you took multiple courses.

choice.name: more_advanced
choice.text: More advanced class than Mechanics ReView, such upper-level college courses

choice.name: same_level
choice.text: Same level of study as Mechanics ReView, including any calculus-based physics course

choice.name: preceeding_class
choice.text: Class that would precede Mechanics ReView, such as an algebra-based physics course in high school

choice.name: self_taught
choice.text: Self-taught in physics - no formal courses in this subject
